author: controlcthenv
content: Is this still planned https://github.com/ethereum/verkle-dev-website ? As I am learning about Verkle I figure it may be good to document as I go, but not sure if this is still planned

author: kevaundray
content:
This is still planned though things kept changing, so it was put on pause.

Also if you know of any better templates that would also greatly help. I was thinking of switching to docusaurus if it supports latex or katex
